attributes.action: Immediate advance the upgrade of overhead power lines on Great Eastern (London to Norwich) line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The line is now suffering ovehead line failures at least 2 to 3 times per year and massive disruption is occurring to passengers often lasting 2 or 3 days.  The current Network rail planned power supply upgrade is for works to start in mid 2010 with the preceding years spent procastinating on the 'options' study.  This upgrade is needed now before the whole system fails.  Network Rail should be instructed by government to issue design and build tenders with an overall peformance specification within the next 3 months for work to start later this year.
